verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ch'oxcaneli to malaj in mul, yujto anhej tas wach' ayoch t'a in pensar in k'ulani. Mamin, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, malaj in chab'k'olal t'ayach.
Mamin, ilin, b'eytzitej in pensar yet' tas tzin nib'ej.
Yujto max b'atcanlaj a wach'k'olal satk'olal wuuj, tzach in k'anab'ajejnhej.
Manh junnhejoclaj tzin ek' yet' heb' ixtum anima. Malaj b'aj junnhej tzin ek' yet' heb' chab' sat.
Tzin yajcanel smolchajelal heb' chuk chi'. Val yel malaj b'aj wach' wak'an yet' heb' tz'ixtanb'at wach' b'eyb'al.
Tzin b'iquel in k'ab' yuj in ch'oxaneli to malaj in chukal. Ichato chi' b'ian tzin ek' oyoyoc t'a spatic yichanh altar,
swalan wach' lolonel t'a b'ital, swalanel masanil tas satub'tac tza b'o'o.
Mamin Jehová, tzin xajanej a templo b'aj cajan ach eq'ui. Ata' tz'alchajel sniwanil elk'ochi.
Manh ik'el in k 'inal yet' heb' sk'ulan chukal. Manh in a satel yet' heb' milum anima,
yujto anhej chukal snib'ej heb' sk'ulej, b'ecan sk'ol heb' schaan k'een tumin yic smontaji.
Ha inxo jun, tzin nib'ej tzin b'eynhej t'a in wach'ilal, yuj chi' colinel Mamin, ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin,
yic tek'annhej waj t'a b'eyb'al wach'. Mamin Jehová, ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal heb' molanek' t'a ichanh.
